appearances.title: The Situation Room : CNNW : January 7, 2026 7:00am-8:01am PST
appearances.snippet: we're going to listen in to senator markwayne mullin, a republican and white house ally, after this briefingon venezuela. let's listen. >> hold him accountable for the men and women he's killed on our streets by poisoning them. so it was well worth it. what happens next with the government? you know, we're going to let the venezuelan people choose that. yes, sir. >> did you hear anything that would give you an indication that american boots on the ground might be necessary? if there are reports of violence sporadically. >> there is no boots on the ground right now and there. but let me tell you, we have contingency plans all around the world just in case something does happen. i'm not speaking specifically to any plan, but i'm just saying that's what we do. we always have contingency plans to keep the american interest. and, and, and our country safe. and so what i just reiterate, reiterate this. the president and this administration is putting a heavy emphasis on the western hemisphere for 25 years, we have focused elsewhere. we are now focused on our backyard. and we should be. yes, ma'am.
